page.title: 06HOMES 2
page.content:
LIVING ROOMS
In peoples homes there are rooms which are sometimes called either the lounge, sitting room, front room, best room, parlour or living room. In the living room there is normally a television set, a three piece suite,some kind of table either for dining or display and a small coffee table. The other popular items are plants, videos and music centres and various ornaments. This living room is usually the most comfortable room in the home where all the family meet often to eat, to entertain or to just sit and watch the television. Many people take great pride in making their living rooms warm and comfortable.
